description: The Clean Climbing revolution started in 1972 with tools like the original hexcentric, shown here with typography inspired by the Chouinard Equipment forge-hammered signature. Fifty years later, we are still in business to save our home planet. A place to start is conserving resources and using them wisely. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, this T-shirt made of 100% recycled fabric reduces our reliance on virgin materials. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Clean Climb Trade Responsibili-Tee - Mens
